note:
Crafts n Beer is a channel on Youtube that will craft, sculpt & paint tabletop terrain for D&D like landscapes, buildings & miniatures etc with mediums like cardboard, Green stuff, Super sculpey, foam etc.. Ever since I was in my early teens, and discovered DnD and Lord of the rings for the first time - I have wanted to build a fantasy world in miniature ...And now the adventure have began & i hope you want to follow this journey with me.
- Beard on and Craft! üç∫
